body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: When members of this race attempt to change a creature's attitude with a Diplomacy check and fail by 5 or more, they can try to influence the creature a second time even if 24 hours have not passed.
name: Sociable
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Sociable
